Package ure.actors.actions

Class UAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • ure.actors.actions.UAction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UActionDrop, UActionEmote, UActionGet, UActionInteract, UActionPass, UActionWalk
    public abstract class UAction
extends java.lang.Object
    UAction subclasses implement actions which Actors can perform to do arbitrary things in the game world which take up game time, may be prevented by other Actors or the world, cause events, and so on. Action instances are generally created by Actors in their act() methods to be returned to the Commander to cause actions to occur. These Action instances are also passed around to event listeners to notify them of the action and its details.

      • doNow

        public float doNow()
        Do whatever it is that actor does, when actor does this. Return the time it took, modified by the actor. Do not override this. Override doMe() to define your custom action's behavior.
        Returns:
        Time this action took to execute, in action time units.
